text: Soni kwa jwalijose (mwa jenumanja) tutomeche nkuntawalila (jwakwe) pa chipanje chalesile achinangolo ŵaŵili ni ŵaulongo, sano aŵala ŵamwataŵene nao chilanga (chakuntawalila chipanje chenu), mwapani liunjili lyao (kupitila mu wasiya wachimwalechele), chisimu Allah pa chindu chilichose aŵele Jwakutendela umboni
